claims.text: The most important thing is that this is a technology that has the opportunity to become the most powerful learning and expression tool ever created.
claims.speaker: Dan Rosensweig
claims.context: Speaking at Northeastern Institute for Experiential AI 'Leading With AI Responsibly' conference about generative AI's transformative potential
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Positions AI as epochal transformation in human capability, authorizing radical product reinvention

claims.text: If you gave this to every student in kindergarten regardless of their background...could we finally break through the structural barriers?
claims.speaker: Dan Rosensweig
claims.context: Discussing AI's potential to democratize education at Northeastern AI conference
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Frames AI as civilizational breakthrough that could overcome entrenched inequality — invokes moral possibility

claims.text: We've got to get together. We're literally going to rip our product down to its roots and reinvent it.
claims.speaker: Dan Rosensweig
claims.context: Response after meeting with OpenAI's Sam Altman about ChatGPT's potential impact on Chegg's business
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Survival framing — existential threat demands immediate radical action, no incremental change viable

claims.text: We're not scared, we're enthusiastic. The fear came because we didn't know what [large language models] were capable of.
claims.speaker: Dan Rosensweig
claims.context: Northeastern AI conference, reflecting on company's posture after initial ChatGPT shock
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Identity claim — defines organizational character as enthusiastic adopters rather than fearful victims

claims.text: The reason I was invited on is I'm the poster child for getting your ass kicked in the public markets by A.I. since I lost 40% of value in five minutes.
claims.speaker: Dan Rosensweig
claims.context: Fortune Brainstorm Tech conference July 2023, opening remarks about Chegg's AI disruption
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Candid survival acknowledgment — uses self-deprecation to authorize urgency and establish credibility as AI-battle-tested leader

claims.text: What the kids at Harvard did, I don't give a shit. I care about the kids who are trying to make their life better. We are being built for the student that is self-initiated, that wants to learn, that needs to understand, that needs to graduate with a skill.
claims.speaker: Dan Rosensweig
claims.context: Fortune Brainstorm Tech conference discussing Chegg's target audience and mission
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Teleological claim defining who Chegg exists to serve — invokes moral purpose of enabling upward mobility for non-elite students

claims.text: This is a period of reinvention at Chegg. We are rebuilding the company focused on the $40 billion skilling market which we believe will be a double-digit revenue growth business.
claims.speaker: Dan Rosensweig
claims.context: Q4 2025 earnings call, explaining strategic pivot after AI disrupted core business
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Survival-through-reinvention — frames complete business model pivot as response to existential threat, with commercial upside

claims.text: We successfully transformed our business from a print textbook rental business to an online learning company, and now we are transitioning from a D2C business to a B2B skills learning platform.
claims.speaker: Dan Rosensweig
claims.context: Q4 2025 earnings call, positioning current AI pivot as third major transformation in company history
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Identity claim — defines company character as serial transformer, normalizing radical reinvention as 'who we are'

claims.text: The demand is shifting rapidly towards how do we make sure that every single employee...actually begin to understand how to utilize AI.
claims.speaker: Dan Rosensweig
claims.context: Q4 2025 earnings call discussing the AI skills training market opportunity
claims.rhetoricalFunction: Commercial framing — identifies AI literacy as universal workforce need that creates market opportunity for Chegg's pivot
